p: The aqueous extract of B. integerrima root was tested on streptozocin diabetic rats. Different doses of the aqueous extract resulted in a significant decrease in blood glucose and lipid profile, while HDL-cholesterol was markedly increased [ 191]. On the contrary, the daily administration of aqueous fruit extract did not possess a hypoglycemic and hypolipidemic activity in streptozocin diabetic rats [ 192].
